attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the rules so that the job related expense accounts, tax-free allowances and travel perks which accrue to elected membes of parliament extend only to the employee and transfer to family members is made illegal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is NOT right that the taxpayer should fund the employee's family when somebody chooses to become a member of parliament.  Their expenses should NOT be transferrable to the family!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
